question: So, can you describe an old friend that you got in contact with again?
transcript: Okay, so I met Rina in the U.S. during my exchange student's life and she is from Japan and we got very, got closer in during the exchange students because we do not have any Asian friends a lot in there. And she is very cute and she is a little bit introvert person. And yeah, she does not have any cacao talk because she is not a Korean. So we usually contact in by the Instagram DM. And yeah, after I come back to Korea, we did not text a lot during the, during nowadays. But she text me like, oh, I have to go to, I am going to go to Korea in June. So yeah, that is, she text me like that. So yeah, we come back again. So yeah, I am so, I am very happy about that and I cannot wait for that, for her visiting to Korea. So yeah, I am planning to look around some places in Seoul with her. So, it is going to be very happy for me. Oh, that is lovely. It was really nice to hear your story. Yeah.

question: So, what is the influence of social media on friendship?
transcript: Okay, so I have a lot of friends who is living in, abroad like US or Japan or Taiwan. I met them in the US and, if I do not have any Instagram or some, the other SNS, I do not have any way to contact with them or something. So I really feel, oh, thanks God. I have some way to contact them or text them. So yeah, I think the SNS or something is very have a good influence to make my friendship. Even I have a lot of current friends too but we don have any time to meet with them So yeah because we have a lot of to we have a lot of things to do or something So, sometimes texting them through the SNS is very helpful, helpful to improve our friendship. okay, that is wonderful.
